column2: Greetings from Orane International!!! We are hiring for Hair Faculty for multiple locations. LOCATION : Kharar, Kphb Kukatpally Branch Hyderabad, Bengaluru (HSR Layout), Hanumangarh, Assandh, Nabha, Manipal, Panipat, Hisar, Rudrapur, Patran, Sirhind, Vasant Kunj, Patti, Karnal, Sirsa, Yamuna Nagar, Chennai, Hoshiarpur, Jalalabad, Jind, Amritsar, Faridkot, Kanakapura, Ludhiana, Nagpur, Raipur, Abohar. COMPANY DESCRIPTION NSDC Approved Training Partner, Orane International is a pioneer in providing quality education in Beauty & Wellness, offering short term and long term courses across its network of 100+ Beauty Schools in India. Required Experience:  1-4 Years. QUALIFICATION: Master in Cosmetology, Post Graduate Diploma in Cosmetology + Hair Level 4, Diploma in Hair Designing + Hair Level 4, Advance Diploma in Aesthetics and Hair Designing + Hair Level 4 from the reputed beauty academy. Job Description: To execute and deliver proper theory and practicals for the different groups. To maintain the students attendance records and dockets. To cover any shortfalls of any student lagging behind in theory & practicals. Maintain proper records of each practical attempted by a student for a single. Interested Candidates can share resume and work samples to HR Ranjeet at 9914822020 or recruiter1@orane.com
column11: Hair Care, Beauty, Hair Coloring, Bleaching, Cosmetology, Hair Cutting, Hair Styling
